title: (x) TypeCon 2004 typeface - Never Mind {Stephen}
content: Anyone knows which is the typeface being used on the TypeCon banner (the upmost one)? ![typecon banner](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221934im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28571.gif)
author: toby

comments.content: Wow, is that a new font site or have I just not been paying attention?
Thanks, I think I must have this one
